item.title: A Pair of Beomaster 1900 Receivers for Restoration: Capacitor Replacement and Slider Controls on Unit #2
item.description:
The second Beomaster 1900 unit is prepped for reassembly after completing the capacitor replacements and slider control repairs. The Volume Control board was addressed first, requiring six capacitor replacements. Here’s the board before: And after the replacements: The Tone Control and FM Tuning board came next. While it only needed ten capacitors replaced, the Bass, Treble, and Balance sliders needed attention. This involved cleaning and repairing the Bass and Treble controls, which had broken slider bridges impacting the switch contacts...
